The run down bot knew he was being  followed, his scences were amzing.
He was afterall the infamous Autobot Repugnas.  He was the unsung hero
for he took the dirty jobs where no one else would and when he got
back his attitude set people apart from him.  He stopped and turned.
His infrared vision showing exactly where the bot stood.
"No need to show your self" the ugly got said.  His pincers snapping shut.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::::
>
> A dark figure stumbles silently behind the bot that had been walking
> through the street. The figure belonged to a rather large Autobot,
> though he was stone drunk. He staggered down the stairs behind the
> other bot, making very little sound even in his condition.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > A lone bot walks through a deserted and run down part of the slums
> on
> > Cybertron.  Upon coming to a mound of scraps the bot sits down on
> and
> > goes to kick a small piece out from the pile when all of a sudden
> the
> > mound opens up reaveling a hole with a stiarway.  He looks into it
> and
> > transforms into his large bug monster mode and his infrared vision
> > comes on. He begins his long descent down into the secret chamber
> > holding the Autobot's ship, the 'Hidden One'.
